title: FS: Lot of 10 T205 w/ Many SP's - Joss, Sweeney, Batch, Cady, Frick

posts.post_title: FS: Lot of 10 T205 w/ Many SP's - Joss, Sweeney, Batch, Cady, Frick
posts.post_content:
Hello. I have the following lot of T205 cards for sale or trade. These are mostly lower grade cards as the scans will show, but most have nice eye appeal for the technical grade. 

Please add $2 shipping for 1-2 cards. For 3 or more, I will cover shipping. Payment via any method you prefer. Please send me a PM or e-mail to [url]marcdelpercio2000@yahoo.com[/url] to purchase any cards or with any questions. Thanks for looking!

Cards Pictured:

Blackburne - $15
Batch - $25
Cady - **SOLD**
Frick - **SOLD**
Joss - **SOLD**
Kroh - $20
Merkle - $18
Smith - $12
Street - $12
Sweeney - **SOLD**

Hello,
 Hi I'm interested in the t205 Joss. What are you looking for in trade? Maybe we could do a cash/trade sort of thing.

Brian
